column4: Hate to ask, but i have had linux for 2 hours now, and i finally getting somewhere.. I want to compile something from terminal, but it gives me the error: configure: error: "no acceptable C compiler found in $PATH" What and how and when? Feel so lost.. Ok, i know, im lame..
isn't there a development package you have to apt-get?  Forgot the name of it.
I don't think ubuntu has devel tools installed by default.
and if your build fails, you might have to install other -dev packages.
